title: Challenging Ordinary
descr: MetalHead is a music-sharing app, where unprofessional musicians can hear opinion on their creations and music consumers can discover new songs. Built with Vue(+Vue-Route, Pinia) and Firebase, deployed on Vercel.

title: Be Yourself
descr: Online shop template built with React(+Router-DOM, Redux), Firebase and Stripe. Deployed on Netlify.
